indications: metronidazole gel , 1 % indicated topical treatment inflammatory lesions rosacea .
contraindications: cleanse treated areas application metronidazole gel . apply rub thin film metronidazole gel daily affected area ( ) . cosmetics may applied application metronidazole gel . topical , oral , ophthalmic , intravaginal .
warningsAndPrecautions: supplied metronidazole gel clear , colorless pale yellow color , supplied follows : 55 gram pump – ndc 68308-663-55 60 gram tube – ndc 68308-663-60 storage handling store controlled room temperature : 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) , excursions permitted 15° 30°c ( 59° 86°f ) .

indications_original: Metronidazole Gel, 1% is indicated for the topical treatment of inflammatory lesions of rosacea.
contraindications_original:
Cleanse treated areas before the application of Metronidazole Gel.
                     Apply and rub in a thin film of Metronidazole Gel once daily to affected area(s). 
                     Cosmetics may be applied after the application of Metronidazole Gel. 
                     For topical use only, not for oral, ophthalmic, or intravaginal use.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
How Supplied
                     Metronidazole Gel is clear, colorless to pale yellow in color, and supplied as follows: 55 gram pump – NDC 68308-663-55 60 gram tube – NDC 68308-663-60 
                     
                     Storage and Handling
                     Store at controlled room temperature: 20° to 25°C (68° to 77°F), excursions permitted between 15° and 30°C (59° and 86°F).
adverseReactions_original: Metronidazole Gel is contraindicated in patients with a history of hypersensitivity to metronidazole or to any other ingredient in the formulation.
